metadata.title: CVE-2023-20910 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In add of WifiNetworkSuggestionsManager.java, there is a possible way totrigger permanent DoS due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to localdenial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
